entry.sentence: In the noble ladies ' convent of St. Mary 's , on the same morning that Countess Alice Treuenfels had been found dead in her bed , there was an extraordinary commotion and commotion .

entry.sentence: In addition , fourteen days for her were ninety-eight days , and Agnes von Ronach was allowed to invite her niece for three days , which made a total of one hundred and one days , that is , plenty of three months .
